full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS SDIG LTUNG MUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,*, ,YE DHARMA'I BYABS KHRUS SDIG LTUNG MUN SEL SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS SDIG SGRIB MUN SEL ZHES BYA BA'I 'DI NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THO YON BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DPAL SNAR THANG PA DANG, DGE BSHES 'CHAD KHA BA GNYIS KYIS MDZAD PA'I RTEN 'BREL SNYING PO'I BYABS KHRUS GZHI BYAS TE, LHA'I BTZUN PA SKU SKYES BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBYAR BAS, YI GE PA NI DGE TSUL BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS RGYAL MTSAN,
